page.title: 18ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: There are several annual events that take place in the area. In Catforth, the{Field Day}is usually held in June. A Rose Queen or Rosebud is selected for the year and is crowned at a ceremony that takes place on Catforth school field. The ceremony is preceded by a procession that goes from the school to the Running Pump. Stalls and sports are a regular feature of the Field Day. The Field Day is run by a Field Day Committee. Events in Inskip are organised by a social committee. Each year there is a {Fun Day,}usually in July, and a {Village Show.}Both make use of the facilities at H.M.S. Inskip, although the Fun Day also makes use of other facilities in the village.
